> > Too complex?

> additional stuff JSON-LD drags along with it beyond those examples.

I'm not trying to argue against you, but to understand. I believe we have
quite similar goals, but follow different approaches to achieve them.
It would definitely help me if you could be a bit more concrete. So, what's
the additional stuff JSON-LD drags along?
